scene_1: ^Well good morning to you- hope you got some sleep with all the thunder last night.
^yeah... Can I help you with something officer...?

insomnia: ^Uh huh, well maybe some more fresh ocean air will help with that
meet_rusty: ^Rusty! Officer Rusty. But everyone 'round here just calls me Russ. I just wanted to introduce myself- seein as you'll be here for a while.
